meta.description: Determine the optimal number of large and small cruise ship trips to minimize pollution while meeting customer transport and trip composition requirements.

sets.name: SHIP_TYPES
sets.description: Types of cruise ships available for trips.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Customer capacity for each type of cruise ship trip.

params.name: pollution
params.description: Pollution units produced by each type of cruise ship trip.

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips for each type of cruise ship.

objective.name: min_total_pollution
objective.expr: sum(trips[s] * pollution[s] for s in SHIP_TYPES)
objective.description: Minimize the total pollution produced by all cruise ship trips.

constraints.name: customer_transport_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 20000 customers are transported.

constraints.name: max_large_trips
constraints.description: There can be at most 7 large cruise ship trips.

constraints.name: min_small_trip_proportion
constraints.description: At least 40% of the total trips must be made by small cruise ships.
